definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
lump (of earth)/chunk/piece/classifier for pieces of cloth, cake, soap etc/(coll.) classifier for money and currency units

sentences.english: The vertebrate brain is the most complex example of a modular system.
sentences.chinese: 脊椎動物的大腦正是這樣的複雜功能模塊。

sentences.english: We mainly focuse on the features of each Sub-module and the design of database.
sentences.chinese: 其中各功能模塊的介紹和數據庫的設計是重點。

sentences.english: It assembles almost all the excitation regulator functional modules.
sentences.chinese: 它集成了勵磁調節器的幾乎所有功能模塊。

sentences.english: Designed and implemented each modules of the fine management of DT.
sentences.chinese: 設計實現了營配臺區精細化管理系統的各個功能模塊。

sentences.english: The basic functional modules of NC system are realized with multi-task program technology.
sentences.chinese: 採用多任務編程技術實現數控系統的基本功能模塊。

sentences.english: Second, perform research on sub-function modules.
sentences.chinese: 其次，進行機器人外圍子功能模塊的研究。

sentences.english: Takashi Morino handled development of firmware utility software.
sentences.chinese: 掌控固件功能模塊的研發。

sentences.english: The Provide Data function provides copies of stored AIPs to Access.
sentences.chinese: 供應數據功能爲存取功能模塊提供檔案信息包的複本。
